<font color="red">*TRANSLATORS NEEDED:*</font> A new version of Tunnelblick is almost ready to be released, and translators are needed for many languages. We especially need translators for *Swedish*, *Polish*, * Japanese*, and *Chinese* (simplified and traditional). If you can help with these or any other languages (no special skills or programs are required), please contact project owner Jon via email at jkbullard at gmail dot com. See the [cTranslationStatus Translation Status] page for the current status of all translations.

*To determine which version of Tunnelblick you are using:*
  # Find Tunnelblick.app (it is usually in the /Applications folder).
  # Click on Tunnelblick.app to select it
  # Click "File", then "Get Info". A window will appear with (among other things) version information.
  
  If there is no version information, it is Tunnelblick version 3.0b9 or earlier.
